Review_Summary: It's real cocoa powder. Not that sweet but it's like dark chocolate in taste. I made chocolate with it using cold pressed coconut oil and honey. At first the taste was pretty okay but the smell of coconut oil was alot more dominant in the chocolate which I obviously didn't like while eating. So I made some changes and the 2nd time it was very delicious with same flavour and taste as regular store bought chocolate. Here's the recipe if someone wants to try it.
